p: From Fig 4 and Table 1, we can see that the total power of agricultural machinery and fertilizer use increased from 1970 to 2014. The maximum value for the total power of agricultural machinery was 11,476.81 10 4 kW in 2014, while the minimum value was 189.60 10 4 kW in 1970. The largest value for fertilizer use was 705.05 10 4 t in 2014. The lowest value appeared in 1970 and was 15.40 10 4 t.
